comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Jan 21, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9405EFDD1538E633A... reported that two "machines" had been seen over Yarmouth, England and that the first dropped bombs. This would be the Yarmouth in Norfolk on England's east coast, facing the North Sea. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Yarmouth The large building looks to be the Town Hall An 1890s picture is at www.oldukphotos.com/graphics/England%20Photos/Norfolk,%20...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq:  Thanks for providing us with more information about this picture.  We'll include some of it in the description next time we update.
